data.message: A marriage can only be between a man and a woman. I will never accept gay marriage!!!! If our grandparents were gay then we would never exist today! Cant believe what this country has become.

replies.message: If your grandparents were straight in the first place, then having gay marriage legalized back then would have posed no problem. Are you saying that you would support forcing homosexuals to engage in heterosexual sex to sustain the population? Hint: there are enough of us around already.
It's a shame, they really need your blessing!!

othank you point made perfectly.... their would be know us with out man and woman making population.... I guess this is the beginning of population control by the government... good luck to the future of the world!
